item.text: Rehoboam traveled to Shechem, for all Israel had gathered in Shechem to make Rehoboam king.

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05028" class="">Nebat</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the news, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was still in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> he had <st data-num="01272" class="">fled</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="08010" class="">Solomon</st>. <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> from <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>.

They <st data-num="07971 07121">sent</st> for him,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>,

“Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="07185" class="">made</st> us <st data-num="05923" class="">work</st> too <st data-num="07185" class="">hard</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> if you <st data-num="07043" class="">lighten</st> the <st data-num="05656 07186">demands</st> <st data-num="01" class="">he</st> made and don’t <st data-num="0834 05414 05921">make</st> us <st data-num="05923" class="">work</st> as <st data-num="03515" class="">hard</st>, we will <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> you.”<n id="2" />
He said to them, “Go away for three days, then return to me.” So the people went away.
King Rehoboam consulted with the older advisers who had served his father Solomon when he had been alive. He asked them, “How do you advise me to answer these people?”

They <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">fair</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="07521" class="">grant</st> their <st data-num="07521" class="">request</st>, and <st data-num="01696 01697 02896">are cordial</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, they will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> from this <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">forward</st>.”<n id="1" />

But Rehoboam <st data-num="05800" class="">rejected</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">their</st> <st data-num="06098 0834 03289">advice</st> and <st data-num="03289 0854">consulted</st> the <st data-num="03206">young advisers</st> who <st data-num="05975 06440">served</st> him, <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> he had <st data-num="01431" class="">grown up</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> them, “<st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> do <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03289" class="">advise</st> me to <st data-num="07725 01697">respond</st> to <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, ‘<st data-num="07043 04480">Lessen</st> the <st data-num="05923 0834">demands</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> us’?”<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="03206" class="">young advisers</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> Rehoboam<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="01431" class="">grown up</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="0559" class="">Say</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st> to these <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, ‘Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">made</st> us <st data-num="05923" class="">work</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">hard</st>, but now <st data-num="0859 07043">lighten</st> our <st data-num="05921" class="">burden</st>’<n id="2" />—<st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them: ‘<st data-num="06995" class="">I</st> <st data-num="05666" class="">am</st> a lot <st data-num="05666" class="">harsher</st> than my <st data-num="04975 01">father</st>!<n id="3" />
My father imposed heavy demands on you; I will make them even heavier. My father punished you with ordinary whips; I will punish you with whips that really sting your flesh.’”
Jeroboam and all the people reported to Rehoboam on the third day, just as the king had ordered when he said, “Return to me on the third day.”

The <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06030" class="">responded</st> to the people <st data-num="07186" class="">harshly</st>. <st data-num="04428 07346">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05800" class="">rejected</st> the <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> of the <st data-num="02205" class="">older men</st>

and <st data-num="01696 0413">followed</st> the <st data-num="06098" class="">advice</st> of the <st data-num="03206" class="">younger ones</st>. He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">imposed heavy</st> <st data-num="05923" class="">demands</st> on you;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="03254 05921">make</st> them <st data-num="03254 05921">even heavier</st>.<n id="2" /> My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03256" class="">punished</st> you with <st data-num="07752" class="">ordinary whips</st>; <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will punish you with <st data-num="06137" class="">whips that really sting your flesh</st>.”<n id="3" />

The king refused to listen to the people, because God was instigating this turn of events so that he might bring to pass the prophetic announcement he had made through Ahijah the Shilonite to Jeroboam son of Nebat.

When all Israel saw that the king refused to listen to them, the people answered the king, “We have no portion in David—no share in the son of Jesse! Return to your homes, O Israel! Now, look after your own dynasty, O David!” So all Israel returned to their homes.

(<st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> continued to <st data-num="04427" class="">rule</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>.)

<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="01913" class="">Hadoram</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0834 05921">supervisor</st> of the <st data-num="04522" class="">work crews</st>, <st data-num="07971" class="">out</st> after them, but the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="07275 068">stoned</st> him to <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st>. <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="07346" class="">Rehoboam</st> <st data-num="0553" class="">managed</st> to <st data-num="05927" class="">jump</st> into his <st data-num="04818" class="">chariot</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">escape</st> to <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="2" />
So Israel has been in rebellion against the Davidic dynasty to this very day.
